code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./PopisDivljaci.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PopisZivotinja(){const[zivotinje,setZivotinje]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('getSveZivotinje');setZivotinje(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Došlo je do greške pri dohvaćanju podataka',error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popis-bodova-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u017Divotinje"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"user-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Naziv"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Opis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Akcije"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:zivotinje.map((zivotinja,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:zivotinja.naziv_zivotinje}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:zivotinja.opis_zivotinje}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"icon-button edit-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"edit-icon",children:"\u270E"})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"icon-button checkbox-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"checkbox-icon",children:"\u2610"})," "]})]})]},index))})]})]});}export default PopisZivotinja;
